Actions.Name: Great Warp
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 takes piercing [fray] damage and is teleported 2.

Actions.Name: Open Rune Gate
Actions.Description: The Rune-skin opens a gate in a free adjacent space, a 1 space terrain effect. Characters that enter the space are teleported 4 to a space of the Planar's choice. Foes can save to choose the destination of their teleport instead. Using this ability moves the gate.
